div.p: I have made the payment (?), Pharmouthi 4. Pompeius Planta to Antamon, strategus of the Oxyrhynchite, greetings. Heraclides son of … the scribe, who was convicted by Claudius Ptolemaeus, strategus of Upper Sebennytos … many artabas from the collection from the … Translation: J. Wedgwood, ZPE 219 (2021) 163
